channel.title: Click here please

item.title: Click here please
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Okay, so i’m trying to make it so when you click my donor tab it will give you a slayer task, here is my code. case 107229: if (c.isDonator == 1) { if (c.slayerTask <= 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(11,npcType); } else { c.getDH().sendDialogues(13,npcType); } } else { c.sendMessage("You must be a Donator to use this!"); }

And here is the error i’m getting…

Read full topic
